actions.name: Aftermath
actions.description:
Trigger: The user gains @Affliction[fainted].
Effect: Connection - Self-Destruct. The user freely uses Self-Destruct. When using Self-Destruct (separately from this Ability's Trigger Affliction), the user may spend an additional 2 PP to instead take damage equal to 1/2 their Max HP on resolving Self-Destruct instead of Fainting.
